display_long_description:
Mezmer is a unique audio-visual experience. 

An alternative entertainment option for enjoying music in VR. Escape, unwind and let your mind wander as "Mezmers" respond dynamically in real-time to the music/audio playing. 

“Mez Out” to relax, disconnect, rejuvenate, meditate, introspect, get inspired - pairing up audio and scenes as you desire. Since everyone's music preferences differ and even change depending on moods, Mezmer offers… 

THREE Audio Source Choices:
•   Mezmer Curated Music 
•   Live Internet Radio Stations! (Genre filtering & Stations from around the world)
•   Your Own Audio Files! (Uploaded to headset: Music, Meditations, Podcasts,...)

Control What You See and What You Hear:
•   Control Mezmer display and Audio playback at any time...
•   Or use the "Auto Change" feature with duration settings for Mezmer switching...
•   Or just "sit" with any Mezmer for as long as you like...
•   The "Mini Menu" also offers easy Next/Previous control over Visual and Audio content.

Some lite interaction relevant to each scene exists but this is not a game, this is more like "Eye Candy with Ears" with no shooting or sweating required. 

Turn On. Tune In. Drop Out. 

---------
UPDATE: Quality of Life/Usability Update ("Interactors" On/Off)
UPDATE: Added 2 More Levels + New "Blendra" Feature
